title: Real Footsteps Sound Effects Library
description: Real Footsteps is the premium library of high-quality footstep samples in the Unreal Engine Marketplace.
longDescription:
This asset contains 354 samples to bring your characters' footsteps to life. Layer in sub impacts, add mechanical sounds to giant robots, recreate a military parade, or recreate the heavily-armored footsteps of a knight. With Real Footsteps youâ€™ll be able to add life to individual human characters, large groups, and fantastical robots. No other footstep library has such a wide array of usable sounds.


- Basketball Court

- Carpet

- Cement

- Creaky Wood Floor

- Dress Shoes

- Forest

- Glass

- High Heels

- Horse

- Knight

- Leaves

- Massive

- Metal

- Military

- Mud

- Puddles

- Sand and Gravel

- Shallow Water

- Sneakers

- Snow

- Squishy

- Sub Impacts


Each sample has been meticulously recorded using 24 bit audio at 96kHz sample rate. Samples have been processed using compressors, equalizers, and limiters to ensure that every sound is detailed and clear. Samples have short fade-ins and longer fade-outs to ensure that there is no popping or clicking present. Lastly, all files have been normalized to -1dB to ensure that all files are easy to work with in your game.


The library includes stereo and mono versions of each sample.


The game-ready audio files have been converted to 16 bit audio at 44.1kHz sample rate so that their memory footprint is acceptable for even the most lightweight mobile games.


Click here to listen!
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 708

Number of Audio Cues: 708

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 22:56

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: N/A

Important/Additional Notes: N/A

releaseInfo.releaseNote: Version 1.1 includes mono versions of the original 354 stereo samples, bringing the total number samples up to 708.
